projects.title: Budget Tracking Tool
projects.descr: An Angular and SpringBoot tool useful to track expenses and incomes.
projects.underdescr: Simple, fast and intuitive application for every day expense tracking
projects.overview: Reviewing content and actioning against that content can be a very difficult, subjective, and (sometimes) traumatic process. This project examined the entire existing workflow and counted for ongoing product and engineering work before beginning an exhaustive redesign effort. The work done is web-based and heavily used onsite conducted user research and studies.
